description: Number of powers of 2 between (but not including) two consecutive primorials.
formula: a(n)= Cardinality{b |A002110(n)<= b < A002110(n+1), b=2^x for some x} a(n)=A045716(n+1)-A045716(n)First differences of A054850.
mathematica: a = Table[ Floor[ Log[2, Product[ Prime[i], {i, 1, n}]]], {n, 1, 110}]; Drop[a, 1] - Drop[a, -1]
author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 22 2000
extensions: Edited by _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 22 2003
